moves.1. e4: Write comments or rate the game if you want...
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. h4: why???? i don't know what he's thinking...worthless movement...
moves.3... Nf6 4. d3 Bc5 5. a3 d6: i wanted to open the other bishop....i'm trying to be typical in the opening...
moves.6. c3: Mmmmm he's blocking his knight...no reason for that again.....
moves.8. Nf3 Bg4: Nice move with my bishop as there is nothing to bother it....his a-pawn is going for a trip..
moves.9. d4 exd4 10. cxd4: Still he has a tough centre....
moves.10... Bb6: My bishop has not the best place....
moves.11. d5: i benefit to move my knight...
moves.11... Ne5 12. Be2: well he should have moved on d-3...
moves.12... Nxe4 13. Kf1: Really bad movement , with no reason...he should have made rocke...now it's the end for white...he killed his game...
moves.13... Nxf2: my worthless bishop in b6 now is becoming worthful...protecting my knight...
moves.15. Qe4: well i don't know what he's thinking but this is the worst movement ever made!!!!!!!! Qe4?? no reason really to do that..now i know that i'll win the game.....
moves.18... Nd3+ 19. Kd2 Nxc1: i decided to take his bishop...
moves.21. Nh2 Be3+: no reason to do that....he's ckecked..
moves.22. Kc2 Bf5+: Still notice that my queen is sleeping...
moves.23... Bxe4+: And of course he resigned...cause he'll be checkmated....too bad game for him...
